title: Development of Personalized Learning Environment Measurement Tools: UDL-Based Mobile Microlearning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic concepts of Universal Design for Learning (UDL) and foundational science knowledge
context.additional_context: Aims to develop and validate personalized learning support tools in smartphone-based environments. Designs measurement tools applying UDL frameworks to strengthen scientific job competencies

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized learning environment metrics based on UDL’s three core elements (engagement, representation, action/expression)
Learners can develop a PLSI (Personalized Learning Supporting Instrument) prototype tool applicable in mobile environments
Learners can validate the tool’s content validity (item-level ≥0.8, scale-level ≥0.9) through a panel of seven or more experts

resources: UDL (Universal Design for Learning) Guidelines Document
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
